text:
Good morning team,
Is there any way to get the delivery status of an marketing email trough Custom codes via Workflow?

I think the answer is No, but is there a mechanism to write *Custom Code* workflow actions in an IDE and publish them up to HubSpot like you can when making a custom Workflow Action? Or is it only editable in the Custom Code UI within the HubSpot workflow? I can work with either, but was hoping for an IDE experience so I can keep the code in Git without needing to copy/paste.
The endpoints I found for Workflow don't let you add Custom Code and they also only support Contact workflows.
